description: Updates the specified attributes of the Direct Connect gateway association. Add or remove prefixes from the association.

parameters.name: addAllowedPrefixesToDirectConnectGateway
parameters.description: The Amazon VPC prefixes to advertise to the Direct Connect gateway. (dict) --- Information about a route filter prefix that a customer can advertise through Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) over a public virtual interface. cidr (string) --- The CIDR block for the advertised route. Separate multiple routes using commas. An IPv6 CIDR must use /64 or shorter.

nested_params.name: cidr
nested_params.description: The CIDR block for the advertised route. Separate multiple routes using commas. An IPv6 CIDR must use /64 or shorter.

parameters.name: removeAllowedPrefixesToDirectConnectGateway
parameters.description: The Amazon VPC prefixes to no longer advertise to the Direct Connect gateway. (dict) --- Information about a route filter prefix that a customer can advertise through Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) over a public virtual interface. cidr (string) --- The CIDR block for the advertised route. Separate multiple routes using commas. An IPv6 CIDR must use /64 or shorter.

nested_params.name: cidr
nested_params.description: The CIDR block for the advertised route. Separate multiple routes using commas. An IPv6 CIDR must use /64 or shorter.

nested_items.name: directConnectGatewayAssociation
nested_items.description: Information about an association between a Direct Connect gateway and a virtual private gateway or transit gateway.

nested_items.name: directConnectGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Direct Connect gateway.

nested_items.name: directConnectGatewayOwnerAccount
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the associated gateway.

nested_items.name: associationState
nested_items.description: The state of the association. The following are the possible values:
associating: The initial state after calling  CreateDirectConnectGatewayAssociation.
associated: The Direct Connect gateway and virtual private gateway or transit gateway are successfully associated and ready to pass traffic.
disassociating: The initial state after calling  DeleteDirectConnectGatewayAssociation.

disassociated: The virtual private gateway or transit gateway is disassociated from the Direct Connect gateway. Traffic flow between the Direct Connect gateway and virtual private gateway or transit gateway is stopped.
updating: The CIDR blocks for the virtual private gateway or transit gateway are currently being updated. This could be new CIDR blocks added or current CIDR blocks removed.

nested_items.name: stateChangeError
nested_items.description: The error message if the state of an object failed to advance.

nested_items.name: associatedGateway
nested_items.description: Information about the associated gateway.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the associated gateway.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of associated gateway.

nested_items.name: ownerAccount
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the associated virtual private gateway or transit gateway.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Region where the associated gateway is located.

nested_items.name: associationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Direct Connect gateway association.

nested_items.name: allowedPrefixesToDirectConnectGateway
nested_items.description: The Amazon VPC prefixes to advertise to the Direct Connect gateway.

nested_items.name: cidr
nested_items.description: The CIDR block for the advertised route. Separate multiple routes using commas. An IPv6 CIDR must use /64 or shorter.

nested_items.name: associatedCoreNetwork
nested_items.description: The ID of the Cloud WAN core network associated with the Direct Connect gateway attachment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the Cloud WAN core network that the Direct Connect gateway is associated to.

nested_items.name: ownerAccount
nested_items.description: The account owner of the Cloud WAN core network.

nested_items.name: attachmentId
nested_items.description: the ID of the Direct Connect gateway attachment.

nested_items.name: virtualGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway. Applies only to private virtual interfaces.

nested_items.name: virtualGatewayRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the virtual private gateway is located.

nested_items.name: virtualGatewayOwnerAccount
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the virtual private gateway.
